jobDescription: Bombora Data Science is an emergent team tasked with knowledge extraction and insight generation from Bombora's significant reserves of business intent data. We are passionate about understanding the complex systems we model and extracting real value from the massive data we analyze. A significant undertaking, we enjoy the challenge, and have fun with the entire Bombora team doing so. This is a project-based, part-time position with competitive compensation and long-term full-time potential, based in our Reno office.what you'll do:
